text: Martin David Ginsburg (June 10, 1932 â€“ June 27, 2010) was an American lawyer. He was the husband of American lawyer and U.S. Supreme Court Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg. He taught law at Georgetown University Law Center in Washington, D.C.. Ginsburg was born in New York City. Ginsburg died on June 27, 2010 from cancer in Washington, D.C. at the age of 78. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2010 deaths Category:Lawyers from Washington, D.C. title: Martin D. Ginsburg
